events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The system has classified the issue as a refund request based on the mention of 'request a refund' and 'size does not fit.'
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who specializes in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that doesn't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been used or is still in original condition?
My order number is 8932047. The jacket is unused and still has all original tags attached as it arrived.
Thank you for the info. We can process the refund once you ship the jacket back to us. I will send you a prepaid return label via email.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response and for providing the return label.
We have received your returned jacket and the refund has been issued to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has appeared in your account. Let us know if you need anything else.
We are closing this case now, but feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or issues.
